text: Hi there, Nya, happy new year, hehe s bit late but we haven't talked in a while! Hope you're alright! I'm still here, so if you have questions, go ahead, please! Cheers
Lol, Ive been good. Yeah I was going to contact you soon as I’ve found a junior concept artist job I want to apply to. I wanted to ask how did you get your first job in animation/ concept art
And if you don’t mind could I  present some of my recent stuff I’ve been working on for my new portfolio to you?
